short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension removes embedded/inline images from quoted messages in Gmail.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Is your Gmail storage always full?

This extension will remove the inline images when you reply or forward an email. This saves your storage space.
